title: 服务器问题
author: sfx160
txt_content:
The state engine was in incorrect state SERVER_STOPPING and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.
玩家个别玩家一登录游戏 服务器就自动关闭
急死了

replies.author: 腾朝丶
replies.txt_content: 有一个专门防崩溃的插件

replies.author: sfx160
replies.txt_content:
qwerard 发表于 2015-9-5 16:26
